title: [SMTChecker] ICE in function "typeBvSizeAndSignedness"
body:

## Description

```
pragma experimental SMTChecker;
contract C {
  constructor() { ~1; }
}
```

throws

https://github.com/ethereum/solidity/blob/98cc1d9994f9332b18df669eb80031454e967451/libsolidity/formal/SymbolicTypes.cpp#L444

## Environment

- Compiler version: latest develop
- Target EVM version (as per compiler settings):
- Framework/IDE (e.g. Truffle or Remix):
- EVM execution environment / backend / blockchain client:
- Operating system:

## Steps to Reproduce

```
$ solc test.sol
```
